Texts.Chs: 这台超光速引擎冒者烟，电路内部烧坏了。
Texts.Eng: A ftl drive spewing smoke. The circuitry is fried on the inside.

Texts.Chs: 不出所料，里面看起来很恐怖，这玩意儿近期都不能用了。
Texts.Eng: As expected, the insides look horrid. This thing ain't working anytime soon.

Texts.Chs: 机器冒烟，机器没有启动。
Texts.Eng: Smoke coming out machine, and machine not starting.

Texts.Chs: 超光速引擎冒出浓烟，我认为它根本不起作用。
Texts.Eng: Smoke is pouring out of this FTL Drive. I don't think it works at all.

Texts.Chs: 超光速引擎里面的电线坏了，已经无法修理了。
Texts.Eng: The wiring inside this FTL Drive is shot. It is well beyond repair.

Texts.Chs: 没有一种方法可以让这个超光速引擎工作。
Texts.Eng: There is not a single way to make this FTL Drive work.

Texts.Chs: 这个超光速引擎正在猛烈地冒烟，还有烧焦的橡胶的味道。
Texts.Eng: This FTL Drive is smoking violently, and smeels of burnt rubber.

Texts.Chs: 推进器坏了，短时间内不可能工作。
Texts.Eng: This drive's shot. Ain't no way it'll work anytime soon.
